FuncDef:
The hard-pipe enable command enables the hard pipe capability in the VSI-LDP view.
The undo hard-pipe enable command disables the hard pipe capability in the VSI-LDP view.
By default, the hard pipe capability is not enabled in the VSI-LDP view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the VSI-LDP view, before configuring hard pipe parameters for a static PW, you have to enable the hard pipe capability using the hard-pipe enable command.
Precautions
If a VSI is bound to an interface, the hard-pipe enable command and the qos-profile command are mutually exclusive in the VSI view.
